Class CrabWorld

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      CrabWorld

public class CrabWorld
extends greenfoot.World

The CrabWorld is the place where crabs and other creatures live. It creates the initial population.

Constructor Detail

CrabWorld

public CrabWorld()
Create the crab world (the beach). Our world has a size of 560x560 cells, where every cell is just 1 pixel.
